# Friday AI

> Intelligent Email Management & Automation System - A production-ready AI assistant with unified inbox, automated email handling, and business process automation.

## Documentation

- [Main README](README.md): Primary project documentation, setup, and stack overview.
- [Copilot Guide](docs/COPILOT_GUIDE.md): Guide for using custom agents (@) and prompts (/).
- [Development Guide](docs/DEVELOPMENT_GUIDE.md): Detailed setup, workflow, and contribution guide.
- [Environment Setup](docs/ENV_SETUP_GUIDE.md): Full guide for configuring the development environment.

## Architecture & Specs

- [Architecture](docs/ARCHITECTURE.md): System architecture and design decisions.
- [API Reference](docs/API_REFERENCE.md): API documentation and endpoints.
- [CRM System](docs/CRM_SYSTEM_DIAGRAMS.md): Diagrams and flows for the CRM module.
- [AI System](docs/AREA_2_AI_SYSTEM.md): Documentation for the AI assistant and automation features.

## Examples & Guides

- [Quick Start](docs/QUICK_START_CRM.md): Quick start guide for the CRM features.
- [Testing Guide](docs/CRM_WORKFLOW_TEST_REPORT.md): Information on testing workflows.

## Configuration

- [Package Config](package.json): Dependencies and scripts.
- [Copilot Instructions](.github/copilot-instructions.md): Custom instructions for AI behavior.
- [Agents](.github/agents/): Custom agent definitions (@Planner, @Implementer, etc.).
